greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Continued fraction expansion of Sum_{k>=1} 1/(2^k - 1).
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..2000
program: (PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 2400); x=contfrac(x=suminf(k=1, 1/(2^k - 1))); for (n=1, 2000, write("b038631.txt", n, " ", x[n])) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Oct 19 2009
results.author: Randall L. Rathbun, Jan 16 2002
